Online Reputation Management preserves the online availability of your business by improving and monitoring its appearance online. The objective of ORM service is to analyse how a potential customer or partner will determine your brand, your people or your product/service after performing a Google Search.

This process is done for enhancing the company or brand reputation in high traffic areas online and getting positive online reviews to put a positive impact on the company among Internet users. Continue reading to know more about ORM Plans in India.

As Seen On

What Does An Online Reputation Management Company In India Do?

The objective of the Online reputation management Company is basically to enhance the company’s reputation by making it eminent and presenting its best results forward. This is done by following the people who support their customers, employees and local communities.

Are ORM Services Worth?

Whether ORM services are worth it or not depends on several factors, such as the nature and severity of the online reputation issue, the goals of the person or business seeking ORM services, and the quality of the ORM service provider. In some cases, ORM services can be highly effective in improving a person or business's online reputation, while in other cases, the results may be limited or short-lived.
Here are some factors to consider when deciding if ORM services are worth it:

Severity of the online reputation issue

If a person or business has a significant online reputation issue, such as multiple negative reviews, damaging news articles, or social media attacks, ORM services may be worth considering. ORM services can help address these issues and restore a person or business's online reputation.

Goals of the person or business

: ORM services can help achieve specific goals, such as improving search engine rankings, increasing positive reviews, or mitigating negative reviews or comments. If achieving these goals is important to a person or business, ORM services may be worth the investment.

Quality of the ORM service provider

The quality of the ORM service provider can also impact the effectiveness and value of the service. It's important to research and compare different ORM service providers to find one that has experience and a proven track record of success.

Long-term vs. short-term results

ORM services can produce short-term results, but it's important to consider the long-term impact on a person or business's online reputation. If the underlying issues that led to the negative reviews or comments are not addressed, the online reputation issue may persist or worsen over time.
ORM services can be worth it if a person or business has a significant online reputation issue and has specific goals that they want to achieve. It’s important to research and carefully evaluate different ORM service providers to ensure that the investment is worthwhile and will produce the desired results.

Types of ORM

Reputation monitoring

This type of service involves tracking mentions of a person or brand across various online platforms, such as social media, review sites, and news articles. Monitoring helps individuals and businesses stay aware of what people are saying about them online.

Social media management

Social media platforms play a significant role in shaping a person or business's online reputation. ORM services can help manage social media profiles, including responding to comments and reviews and creating social media strategies that align with a person or business's reputation goals. Social media management can play a vital role to defend the online reputation for any person or business.

Reputation Repair

This type of service is designed to repair a damaged online reputation. It typically involves removing negative content, such as defamatory reviews, from search engine results and replacing them with positive content.

Search engine optimization (SEO)

SEO involves optimizing a person or business's website and content to appear higher in search engine results. ORM services may use SEO strategies to ensure positive content appears at the top of search results and negative content is buried. Building social profiles and backlinks for contents will help to bring positive results on first page and suppress the negative reuslt to the second page or lower.

Content Creation

Creating positive and engaging content about a person or business can help improve their online reputation. ORM services may offer content creation services, such as blog posts, social media updates, and videos, that can help boost a person or brand's online image.

Review & Crisis Management

ORM services may help manage reviews by responding to negative comments and encouraging positive reviews from satisfied customers on sites like Yelp. TripAdvisor etc. In the event of a crisis, such as a negative news story or social media backlash, ORM services can provide guidance on how to manage the situation and mitigate the damage to a person or business's reputation.

Why Is Online Reputation Management Important?

In today’s era, when there’s a huge competition among online businesses, no business owner can afford to get even a single comment against his/her reputation.

Nowadays each and every review and feedback of the customers is crucial for the company’s reputation. In addition to this, it holds significant importance in determining the company’s status and well-being.

In order to maintain the good reputation of your online business, online reputation management is required. With an efficient and effective ORM, a business can build a positive image in front of the customers, thrive in the market and can acquire new customers.

How much do ORM services Cost?

The cost of ORM services can vary depending on the scope and complexity of the project, as well as the reputation management provider's experience and expertise. Some ORM providers charge a flat fee, while others charge on a per-project or hourly basis. Here are some factors that can impact the cost of ORM services:

  • Complexity
  • Level of Monitoring Required
  • Services Required
  • Experience & Expertise
The cost of ORM services can increase depending on the complexity of the project. For example, if a person or business has a large online presence, multiple negative reviews or articles, or complex issues that need to be addressed, the ORM service may need to invest more time and resources to address them effectively.
ORM services may charge based on the level of monitoring required to keep track of a person or business’s online reputation. If a person or business needs frequent monitoring across multiple platforms, the cost may be higher.
Different ORM services may offer different types of services, as mentioned earlier, such as content creation, review management, social media management, and search engine optimization. The cost may vary depending on the specific services required.
ORM services provided by more experienced and specialized reputation management providers may cost more than those provided by less experienced or generic providers.

The cost of ORM services can range from a few hundred to several thousand dollars per month. It’s important to research and compare different ORM providers and their pricing structures to find one that meets your needs and budget.

How Long Will It Take To Fix A Damaged Corporate Online Reputation?

Re-building the damaged reputation isn’t a one shot process, and it requires a significant amount of time to regain that positive and constructive image in front of potential customers. Along with this, there are competitors who are always ready to turn your bad image into the worst, because of which the reputation of business keeps on degrading each passing day. Thus, there’s no specific time period for fixing a damaged reputation and it merely depends upon condition and circumstances.

But, here at RankOn Technologies, the best ORM company in India, our ORM experts follow a goal-oriented approach that leads us to deliver guaranteed results in a very short duration of time.

Frequently Asked Questions About ORM Packages

What Is The Cost Of The ORM Package Per Month?

The average monthly ORM cost for a project is 104$ (8,000 INR)/Month to 350$ (25000 INR)/Month.

How Long Does It Take To Fix The Damaged Reputation?

The exact time can’t be anticipated to fix the damaged reputation. It solely depends on what we want to achieve, how authoritative the link is and the opted package by the client. For us it takes a minimum of 2 months and a maximum of 5 months to fix the reputation.

Do You Offer Custom ORM Packages?

Yes we do, we consider every single requirement of our clients and then customize their package according to their needs.

Can I Change My ORM Package Later?

Rankon Technologies understands the fluctuating nature of businesses and thus provides the flexibility of changing the ORM package to its clients. With us, you have the ease to convert your package from one form to another.

Why Is Your Package Categorized?

Package categorization helps us to deliver the results at a price that our client can afford. Gold, Silver and Bronze Packages enable our clients to achieve their needs according to their budget.
